title: Women, Their Retirement Security and What To Do If You Feel Behind
description: Men and women do not approach retirement savings the same way -- aside from different investing behaviors, women have historically earned less because of the gender wage gap, or left the workforce mid-career to care for their children or elderly loved ones. MarketWatch's retirement reporter Alessandra Malito and Cindy Hounsell from the Women's Institute for a Secure Retirement discuss women's retirement security and what can be done to prepare for the future.
